movies.title: The Day the Earth Caught Fire
movies.plot: British reporters suspect an international cover-up of a global disaster in progress... and they're right. Hysterical panic has engulfed the world after the United States and the Soviet Union simultaneously detonate nuclear devices and have caused the orbit of the Earth to alter, sending it hurtling towards the sun.
movies.awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 nomination.

events.title: two nuclear bombs are detonated on the same day, by the US and USSR
